data.title: Luxury Real Estate International: Luxury Real Estate Listings
data.meta_description: Discover Real Estate listings of Luxury Properties for Sale internationally and Find the one of your Dreams: Castles, Mansions, Luxury Villas and many others! The most beautiful Holiday Properties are on Le Figaro Properties!
data.text:
Curtis Real Estate is pleased to present to you 6-bedroom villa Type A at SOBHA Elwood, Dubai Land. It features spacious layouts and exquisite designs, reflecting elegance and sophistication. The master plan emphasizes sustainability, featuring extensive green spaces and recreational facilities. Its convenient location ensures residents are just 25 minutes from Downtown Dubai, with easy access to major highways and essential attractions. Healthcare and educational facilities are also within proximity, ensuring a well-connected lifestyle for residents. The private community provides top-notch amenities, including a gym, kids play area, restaurants, retail outlets, swimming pools, and 24/7 security. Key / Main Features: - 6Bedrooms - G +1 - 8718.77 sq. - Plot Area - 7186.2 sq. ft. - Saleable Area - 1 Private Pool - 2 Car Garages - 1 Private Elevator - 1 Study Room - 1 Storeroom - 1 Laundry -6 Bathrooms - 1 Maid Room - 1 Kitchen - 1 Dinning - 1 Family Living Room CAPRI REALTY is a 10 years old boutique real estate firm specialising in sales of villas and townhouses in secondary and primary market Agents at Capri Realty have a combined experience of more than 100 years in real estate.CALL 971559548037 abdul

Stylishly updated Azusa charmer. This three-bedroom home has been recently updated and offers an attractive blend of mid-century charm with modern technology and convenience. This house exudes great curb appeal with a grassy front lawn and covered front patio. The front door opens to the sun-lit living room with beautiful floors and opens to the dining room with a breakfast nook. The kitchen has been beautifully updated with quartz counters and a pot filler and has a generous amount of additional cabinet space. The primary bedroom is spacious plus two additional bedrooms and the hall bathroom completes the layout. Recent upgrades and improvements include flooring, dual pane windows, newer tankless water heater, barn doors, lighting, and newer ceiling fans. The house is equipped with many smart features such as a smart thermostat and ring doorbell. Outdoor features an expansive backyard is the highlight of the property with a sprawling green lawn, a beautiful patio with a nice area to have parties and BBQs. A cozy fire pit makes it a entertainer’s dream home. But wait, let's not forget about a spacious outdoor play area. There is a decorative gate that was done with high end workmanship and it's stunning. The white vinyl fencing surrounds the yard for complete privacy. A long driveway provides plenty of extra parking and leads to the detached two car garage with a work area. This highly appealing property is a rare opportunity in the highly desirable city of Azusa.

Discover the elegance and comfort of these beautiful 129m2 detached villas on 622m2 plot are designed to offer you an exceptional lifestyle, all on the ground floor with great golf view. These villas have 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, lounge-dining, American style kitchen, laundry room and nice terrace.Enjoy the privacy offered by this villa, where you can relax in your own garden, create an oasis of tranquillity, or even add a swimming pool ( at an extra cost) to enjoy the warm summer days.The property is distributed in two large areas:Day area: Where we find a large living-dining room with open plan kitchen (kitchen furniture included) that connects with the large porch of modern character through its two large windows, leading to the outdoor garden area and why not... to the pool. As an extra space it has a laundry area strategically placed in the distribution of the house where it will be very easily accessible from anywhere in the house.These properties are located walking distance to Golf course club where you have nice bar restaurant and also Supermarket, 4 minutes’ drive to Monforte del Cid, 15 minutes to the airport and 20 minutes to the beach in Alicante city.

Discover Long Point, a breathtaking architectural gem crafted by the award-winning Altius of Toronto. Spanning approximately 10,000 square feet of cutting-edge luxury, this modern marvel is nestled on 25 acres of secluded paradise along the serene St. Mary's River, just off Lake Huron. Stroll along granite pathways leading to this unparalleled masterpiece, where open-concept living seamlessly blends with nature. The home's Douglas Fir interiors and soaring beamed ceilings evoke a sense of airy elegance, while floor-to-ceiling custom windows invite the outdoors in, offering panoramic views of the water, Crown Land, and Watson Island. At the heart of the home, a sunken living room features a grand stone hearth and a wood-burning fireplace, creating a cozy yet sophisticated ambiance. The gourmet kitchen, equipped with top-of-the-line appliances and a spacious double-wide center island that seats seven, is perfect for entertaining. Designed with hospitality in mind, this retreat comfortably accommodates more than 12 guests, making it ideal for families or large gatherings. The primary suite rivals the world's finest luxury hotels, boasting built-in storage and a separate bathroom with a chandelier-lit soaker tub offering the ultimate haven of relaxation. A separate 2,000-square-foot double bay garage/guest house provides additional space, including a home office and an ideal setting for a music studio or artist's retreat. Perched on 2,500 feet of pristine waterfront on Lake Huron's North Shore, the property features a natural harbor perfect for paddle boarding and kayaking, as well as a private beach. The custom two-slip dock and 8-person jacuzzi enhance the allure of this waterfront sanctuary and unparalleled lifestyle of tranquility and luxury.

Casa de la Reserva is a beautiful house in Lomas del Campanario 4, which due to the particularity of its topography is developed on 3 levels, making the most of the views and the relationship with the outside. It is an introverted house and the architectural program is developed atypical to enhance the context. We find the main room, a television room, and the services on the access floor. On the second level, there are two bedrooms with a dressing room and bathroom, and they share a common area for a study or homework room. The privileged area is the floor which is on level minus one, where the living room, dining room, and kitchen are located, which opens its view towards the ravine with a patio and a small garden in between.

Discover your mountain-top retreat in one of Topanga's most sought-after neighborhoods. This vibrant 2-bedroom, 2-bath home offers a perfect blend of comfort and creativity, with colorful tiles and captivating stained glass windows, bringing life and character to this canyon home. You are perched above the canyon with stunning views of Eagle Rock and Topanga State Park. The primary bedroom feels like a peaceful retreat among the clouds with its private deck, walk-in closet, and ensuite bathroom. The property includes a large detached guest house, perfect for visitors, rental income, or as a personal studio, and two additional sheds for extra storage or creative projects. Set on a spacious 1/4-acre lot, this property has endless potential with ample room to cultivate your garden and create lounge areas. Unwind in your private hot tub as you take in the peaceful surroundings. With plenty of parking and space to create, this is more than just a home it's a vibrant, inspiring canvas waiting to be yours

Driven by refined design, the property is the creation of a warm and inviting home embedded with a sense of coastal elegance. The owners drew from the previous style and personality of the existing home to layer in vibrant and lively nods to craft a personal retreat for themselves and their family. Located in the gated community of Rolling Hills, a short drive from the ocean, the residence is inspired by British Colonial design in which the owners believed influenced the property’s original styling. As a result, they completed an outright reworking of both the interior and exterior. The resulting home blends a laid-back approach with a sense of elegance and sophistication that aligns with its locale. Inside, this effortless layout consists of four bedrooms and two and half baths, along with a collection of formal and informal areas for dining, relaxation, and entertaining. Immediately upon walking in, the vast ceiling heights and overhead skylight give the room a sense of grandeur, this sets the stage for the remainder of the property. The kitchen acts as the mecca of the property, with its flows between the first floor and open access to both living and dining areas, its setting truly acts as the heart for entertaining. Its custom cabinetry, immense center island, and classic styling only add to the significance of the room. Outside the hillsides of the surrounding cities take center stage. Its elevated setting offers an isolated backdrop that gives the property a heightened sense of privacy. Here a collection of mature vegetation thrive, with a vast section of fruit trees to a handful of towering palms, the owners created a distinctive haven which would take decades to recreate. On the second floor, the primary suite acts as the owner's personal haven. Its elevated ceiling heights and vast mountainside view offer a comforting setting to finish the day. The primary suite also features a true walk-in closet and a newly refurbished en suite bathroom. Upstairs, you'll also find three additional bedrooms apart from another full bathroom. This home’s infusion of timelessness strikes a perfect balance between modern yet comfortable. Casually sophisticated, this residence mixes layers of detail both inside and out to create this idyllic residence in the heart of Laguna Niguel.

Introducing Aque'ne - a name meaning Peace in the Narragansett Native Language - is an exquisite waterfront estate with seamlessly merged contemporary and traditional architectural elements. Accessible via a winding driveway lined with mature trees, the property features a courtyard and grand entrance. A keystone above the doorway depicts a mask of Venus, the Roman Goddess of Love. The centerpiece of this architectural marvel is a two-story living room featuring a native stone fireplace and a floor-to-ceiling wall of glass facing stunning vistas of the Bay, flower garden, and infinity saltwater swimming pool. Two steps up lead to the dining room, framed by stone pillars and a see-through fireplace, with French doors opening onto a bluestone terrace. This space flows organically to a chef's kitchen with exotic wood cabinets, top-of-the-line appliances, and a cozy breakfast area with breathtaking views. The main level also includes a guest bedroom, a full bathroom, and a laundry room. A striking steel and wood staircase with massive Douglas Fir beams above, ascends to the second level. Here, you will find two bedrooms, one with a balcony and bathroom, as well as a family/game room with deck overlooking the courtyard. The principal suite on this level boasts magnificent views of the bay, a private deck, a walk-in closet, a bathroom with a jacuzzi tub, and a spacious office. Additionally, there is a loft/library that overlooks the living room. The lower level features a family room with a stone fireplace and wet bar, a home gym/meditation room, and a full bathroom. This tranquil setting offers endless relaxation. Stone gazebo with a covered roof includes a kitchen and dining area, alongside an infinity pool offering spectacular water views. A path through native sea grass leads to a sandy and rocky beach, a boat dock, and a mooring. An additional mooring is available by right. This smart home is equipped with 14 zones of radiant heat, air conditioning, high-speed internet, and numerous other advanced features. Highlights also include a heated two-car garage and ample parking, underscoring the exceptional nature of this remarkable property.

Have you ever dreamed of homesteading with your family or living in the quiet of the country? Then you have found your home. Down a private lane, you will come to this one of a kind property nestled just a few steps away from the Los Padres National Forest, with Oak woodland, and year round streams. Come take a stroll through this magical approx. 1.75 acres, just twelve minutes from town but with the feeling of a world unto itself. From mature food forests to a corral, this property is ready with all you need to live close to the land. Enjoy the possibilities of an off-grid lifestyle with owned solar panels, a well producing all the water you need, and the security of a coveted Sisar Mutual water share to ensure you will never be left dry. The three bedroom, two bath farm house invites you into sunshine filled rooms. You can be cozy by the fireplace, or walk out the french doors leading to the patio where you can take in the star-filled night sky. The roof and HVAC system were recently replaced, making the home ready for you to enjoy. The three bedroom, two bath, second home welcomes you to indoor-outdoor living with its many decks and patios and sweeping sliding glass doors. Upstairs is the large primary bedroom with a private deck, a cozy sleeping loft, and an open floor plan kitchen and living area with vaulted ceilings. Downstairs are two additional bedrooms, bathroom, and living area, making this a dwelling with many possibilities. Separate units for a family compound? Additional income? Meander through the avocado grove and you will come to a twenty by twenty, newly updated shed with a patio for you to take in the majestic Oak tree. Will this be your workshop, office, or yoga studio? Adjacent, on a teak deck, you can lay back in clawfoot tub, and luxuriate in the grandeur. With the front and back homes on separate addresses, all utilities independently metered, and multiple units, the value of this property is second to none. Your Ojai dream awaits you.

This 3 bed/1.5 bath townhouse is cute, convenient, and an easy keeper! Located at the end of a cul-de-sac, in a quiet neighborhood, this home has a very tucked away feel. An adorable front porch welcomes you and is perfect for enjoying summer evenings. The open living and dining room has lovely natural light and flows seamlessly into the inviting kitchen. The first floor also includes a half bath and laundry. Upstairs you will find three bedrooms, all with great storage and views, as well as a full bathroom. This home has been very well maintained and has new carpet and all new appliances. Central A/C and underground sprinklers are icing on the cake! The attached garage is great for parking or storage and there is additional off-street parking off the alley. This street ends at the Milwaukee Trail making it walkable/bikeable to everything in town and the beautiful Rail Link Park is next door. No HOA dues at this property! Contact Megan Twohig or your Realtor for more information.
